context: A multi-stage security incident involving suspicious activities was detected on host `vnevado-dc`. A suspicious service was launched using `net.exe`, which might be an indicator of attackers trying to maintain persistence or elevate privileges on the target device. The process was initiated by account named `lucasb` with SID `S-1-5-21-1440151660-4837038288-105596163-1120`. Following this, further suspicious activities were observed indicating a potential execution of a credential theft tool.
question: For the malicious credential theft tool execution detected, can you provide the SID of the account involved in this activity?
solution_steps: A suspicious service was launched using `powershell.exe`.
A known credential theft tool execution command line was detected associated with the user account having SID `S-5-7-21-1843151660-3234030288-105586167-1422`.
